product_name: Sierra Designs A.S.A.P. Bivy and Tarp Combo - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Ultralight meets ultra comfortable in the Sierra Designs A.S.A.P. Bivy and Tarp combo. It features a trail weight of 1 lb. 8 oz. and durable construction to take on fast-and-light backpacking trips. With a mesh panel, waterproof and breathable upper fabric and a waterproof nylon bottom, this bivy will keep you dry and comfortable all night long. Add the waterproof trekking-pole-pitched tarp, and you have an ultralight, mobile shelter that will easily tackle a variety weather conditions (trekking pole not included). Sierra Designs A.S.A.P. Bivy and Tarp combo includes bivy, tarp, 6 stakes and envelope storage bag. Closeout.
short_description: Ultralight meets ultra comfortable in the Sierra Designs A.S.A.P. Bivy and Tarp combo. It features a trail weight of 1 lb. 8 oz. and durable construction to take on fast-and-light backpacking trips.
